casebody.data:
No. COA18-615 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 18, 2018

BRINKLEY PROPERTIES OF KINGS MOUNTAIN, LLC, Jerry Moore, Carolyn Moore, Don Baber, Gail Baber, Barry Rikard, Jenny Rikard, Stephanie Short, Shane Short, Alice White, Mabel Moore, Mike Whitehead, Elizabeth Whitehead, Leonard White, George Greer and Mary Greer, Plaintiffs,
v.
CITY OF KINGS MOUNTAIN, North Carolina, Orchard Trace of Kings Mountain, LLC, Defendants.

AFFIRMED.
